# Changelog

## Version 0.1.0

### âœ¨ Features
- Add snap package build and upload to Snap Store for Linux distribution
- Add comprehensive file logging to release scripts
- Add winget manifest generation for Windows package management
- Add SNAPCRAFT_STORE_CREDENTIALS support for automated snap publishing
- Add manifest templates for winget and snap packaging
- Add modern Git branch icon and icon conversion script

### ğŸ› Bug Fixes
- Correct snap build paths, bundle locations, and snapcraft.yaml structure
- Use gnome-3-34 extension for snap compatibility
- Clean temp directory before snap build and add Docker workdir configuration
- Move build logs to artifacts folder for better organization
- Upload latest-{platform}.json manifest for auto-update functionality
- Use tag version directly without build numbers

### ğŸ“ Documentation
- Add SNAPCRAFT_STORE_CREDENTIALS to .env.example

### ğŸ§¹ Chores
- Remove Android and iOS platforms (desktop-only application)
- Remove unused Platform parameter from winget call
- Remove winget step from Linux build (Windows-only feature)

# Changelog

### ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Â ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬Ãƒâ€¦Ã‚Â¡ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¡ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Â ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¬ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¦ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬Ãƒâ€¦Ã‚Â¡ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¬ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬Ãƒâ€¦Ã¢â‚¬Å“ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Â ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¬ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Â¦Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¡ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬Ãƒâ€¦Ã‚Â¡ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¡ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¨ Features
- Add platform-specific changelog generation and copy to main changelog before packaging
- Implement snap build and upload automation with Snapcraft Store credentials support
- Add comprehensive file logging to release scripts
- Add winget and snap manifest templates for package management
- Add modern Git branch icon with conversion script
- Generate winget manifests during build process

- Fix Linux build issues and snap configuration with gnome-3-34 extension
- Correct snap build paths, bundle locations, and snapcraft.yaml structure
- Fix Docker workdir and credential handling for snap uploads using env-file approach
- Prevent build-prep from deleting release scripts directory
- Move build logs to artifacts folder and upload latest-{platform}.json for auto-updates
- Use tag version directly without build numbers
